cards: [ctx_1] California, United States — California SB976 — "Multiple verification touchpoints throughout user journey **Compliance Reporting:**"
[ctx_2] California, United States — California SB976 — "Age-appropriate content verification systems"
[ctx_3] Utah, United States — Utah Code §13-2c-301 et seq. — "Regular re-verification of minor status **Default Privacy Settings:**"

[ctx_4] US-FL — Florida House Bill 3 - Social Media Platforms (extract) — "(2) A social media platform must notify a user before implementing a change to its algorithm that may result in a material change to how content is promoted, suggested, amplified, or suppressed for that user"

passages.text: Multiple verification touchpoints throughout user journey **Compliance Reporting:**
Regular re-verification of minor status **Default Privacy Settings:**

(2) A social media platform must notify a user before implementing a change to its algorithm that may result in a material change to how content is promoted, suggested, amplified, or suppressed for that user. ## Section 501.2044
passages.law: Florida House Bill 3 - Social Media Platforms (extract)
